definitions.definition: The act of saying sorry; an apology.
(of a person) Regretful for an action; grieved or saddened, especially by the loss of something or someone.
definitions.example: I am sorry I stepped on your toes. It was an accident.
The storm left his garden in a sorry state.

definitions.definition: Pathetic and inferior to the point of causing others disgust.
definitions.example: Bob is a sorry excuse for a football player.
Sorry! I didn't see that you were on the phone.

definitions.definition: Used as a request for someone to repeat something not heard or understood clearly.
definitions.example: Sorry? What was that? The phone cut out.

definitions.definition: Used to correct oneself in speech.
definitions.example: There are four — sorry, five — branches of the store locally.
